DOC.brief_summary: Leucine supplementation could useful support muscle anabolism . This study aim investigate effect leucine supplementation muscle mass muscle strength young subject undergoing resistance training .
DOC.brief_title: Leucine Supplementation Young Subjects Undergoing Resistance Training
DOC.criteria: train experience > 12 month previous use anabolic steroid diagnose disease injury time recruitment onemaximum repetition strength ( 1RM ) leg press ≥ 3.5 ≤ 5.0 time body weight use creatine betaalanine supplement last 3 month use protein aminoacids supplement last 1 month engagement specific dietary restriction engagement competitive sport
